questions.question: As a fashion designer, what is the main reason to use social media for marketing?
options: B) To promote your business and attract customers

questions.question: You are a food vendor. Which social media platform is best for showcasing your meals and attracting customers?
How can you tell if your social media efforts are working?
options: B) Tracking engagement, sales, and asking customers how they found you

options: A) Skincare tips and before-and-after transformation photos

questions.question: What is a content pillar?
options: A) A main theme or topic you regularly post about
B) A physical object used in social media
C) A sales tool for paid ads

questions.question: Why should you have a content calendar?
options: A) To plan posts ahead and stay consistent
C) To avoid engaging with customers
